trans-unit.source: Represents a property identifier and the property value for a locally set dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 表示屬性識別項和本機設定相依性屬性的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are returned when getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的值時，會傳回此類別的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> properties are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry>屬性是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別具有公用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: In order to obtain instances of this class you must call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A>, and then get the value of <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A> from the returned <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得您必須先呼叫這個類別的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetLocalValueEnumerator%2A>，然後取得的值<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator.Current%2A>從傳回<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator>。

trans-unit.source: The following example iterates locally set values of a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> and queries <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會逐一查看本機設定值的<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>和查詢<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: 與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 相比較的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="M:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.op_Equality(System.Windows.LocalValueEntry,System.Windows.LocalValueEntry)" /> implementation compares the values of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property" />, and potentially compares the values of <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="M:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.op_Equality(System.Windows.LocalValueEntry,System.Windows.LocalValueEntry)" /> 實作會比較 <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property" /> 的值，而且也可能比較 <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property" /> component of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> is a value type, so will always be a bitwise comparison.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 元件為值型別，因此永遠都是位元 (Bitwise) 比較。

trans-unit.source: For the <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value" /> component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value" /> 元件是值型別，這個實作會運用位元比較。

trans-unit.source: For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it just uses the == operator on the two values internally.
trans-unit.target: 針對擁有參考型別的本機設定屬性，行為會受到此型別相等判斷機制的延後，因為它只會在兩個數值上內部使用 == 運算子。

trans-unit.source: By default, this would be a reference equality of the values and thus the equality of the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> would become a reference equality.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這會是值的參考相等，所以整個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 的相等將會變成參考相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer value.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的 32 位元整數值。

trans-unit.source: The first instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> instances to determine whether they are the same.
trans-unit.target: 比較指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 執行個體，判斷它們是否相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="obj1" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> is equal to the <paramref name="obj2" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若 <paramref name="obj1" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 等於 <paramref name="obj2" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.op_Equality%2A> implementation compares the values of the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>, and potentially compares the values of <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此 <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.op_Equality%2A> 實作會比較 <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A> 的值，而且也可能比較 <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A> component of a <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> is always a value type, so this comparison will always be a bitwise value comparison.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>元件<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry>永遠是實值類型，因此這項比較一律為位元的值比較。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A> component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value%2A> 元件是值型別，這個實作會運用位元比較。

trans-unit.source: For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it uses the `==` operator on the two values internally.
trans-unit.target: 針對擁有參考型別的本機設定屬性，行為會受到此型別相等判斷機制的延後，因為它只會在兩個數值上內部使用 `==` 運算子。

trans-unit.source: By default, this is a reference equality of the values.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這是值的參考相等。

trans-unit.source: The first instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> instances to determine whether they are different.
trans-unit.target: 比較指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator" /> 執行個體，判斷它們是否不同。

trans-unit.source: This implementation compares the values of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value" /> components of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會比較 <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property" /> 的值和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 元件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property" /> component of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> is always a value type, so this comparison will always be a bitwise comparison.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry" /> 元件永遠為值型別，因此這個比較永遠都是位元比較。

trans-unit.source: For the <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value" /> component, this implementation employs a bitwise comparison if it is a value type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Value" /> 元件是值型別，這個實作會運用位元比較。

trans-unit.source: For locally set properties that have reference types, the behavior is deferred to that type's equality determination mechanisms, because it uses the <see langword="==" /> operator on the two values internally.
trans-unit.target: 針對擁有參考型別的本機設定屬性，行為會受到此型別相等判斷機制的延後，因為它只會在兩個數值上內部使用 <see langword="==" /> 運算子。

trans-unit.source: By default, this is a reference equality of the values.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這是值的參考相等。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the locally set dependency property that is represented by this entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得以這個項目表示之本機設定相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the locally set dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 本機設定之相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to query the identifier of the locally set dependency property and to obtain its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性用於查詢的識別項的本機設定相依性屬性，並取得它的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: This obtained metadata may include the initial default value of the property and whether the property supports property value inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 取得中繼資料可能包含屬性的屬性是否支援屬性值繼承的初始預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the locally set dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 取得本機設定之相依性屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the locally set dependency property as an object.
trans-unit.target: 本機設定之相依性屬性的值，以物件表示。

trans-unit.source: To determine a more specific type for this value, check the <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A> for the current <xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry> and get its <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.PropertyType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷此值更特定的類型，請檢查<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry.Property%2A>目前<xref:System.Windows.LocalValueEntry>並取得其<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.PropertyType%2A>。
